name: Super Motor Rider
description:
Racing, ride your super monster motor bike with high speed, around highway and nice fantastic environment. Very thrilling and relaxing with some more drifting your bike on highway. Just take your dream super monster motor bike and do your racing.
This is very basic of racing , ride motor circle game
Features:
- Amazing graphics of super monster motor bike , highland environment
- Simple controls to control and ride your dream motor circle super monster on nice environment of highland
- Gas, break buttons to race your racing , ride super monster motor bike
- Swing your device to control your super monster motor circle steer
- Automatic gear of your racing , ride super monster motor bike
- Camera button to change your view of racing , ride super monster motor circle
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vwAzhlZTfek&feature=youtu.be
